screenshot.caption: CDMTZ file open in CS Odessa ConceptDraw MINDMAP 14

description: ConceptDraw MINDMAP is a mind-mapping tool for helping you organize and visualize ideas and plans, such as birthday parties, new construction, mobile app development, etc. The app is included with the ConceptDraw OFFICE suite, which also comes with ConceptDraw PROJECT and ConceptDraw DIAGRAM.

CS Odessa packages CDMTZ templates with ConceptDraw MINDMAP but also allows you to create custom CDMTZ templates. To access templates included with ConceptDraw MINDMAP, click the "Solutions" icon in the app. Additionally, to create custom CDMTZ templates, select File â†’ Save as Template .
